content: © barbara strasser 2008 www esbelotta com all rights reserved amigurumi banana an amigurumi crochet pattern © barbara strasser 2008 all rights reserved e-mail info@esbelotta com free crochet pattern for personal use you may not share translate copy or publish this pattern for private use only no commercial use © barbara strasser 2008 www esbelotta com all rights reserved notes skills level intermediate to difficult the basic figure is made with single_crochet in the round for making the peels advanced crochet skills are needed materials abbreviations us notation − yarn/wool in crème and yellow − crochet hook in fitting size st stitch es − filling slip_stitch slip_stitch − craft eyes and/or embroidery floss chain chain − pink powder or felt for cheeks single_crochet single_crochet − tapestry needle scissors stitch marker craft half_double_crochet half_double_crochet glue if needed e g for attaching eyes or double_crochet double_crochet embellishment pic chain 3 slip_stitch in base stitch increase increase 2 single_crochet in next stitch decrease decrease 2 single_crochet worked off together flo front loops only pattern fo fasten_off − i recommend beginning with an magic_ring − all rounds are worked in a continuous spiral do not join rounds with a slip_stitch of course you can work all rounds joined if you want to − you may find it useful to use a stitch marker for counting your rounds − the banana is worked from top white part to bottom yellow part top part with créme round 1 6 single_crochet round 2 increase around 12 round 3 single_crochet around 12 round 4 2 single_crochet increase repeat around 16 round 5 12 single_crochet around 16 round 13 7 single_crochet increase repeat 18  if you re using safety eyes attach them now stuff the banana as you go on or stuff at the end just what feels more comfortable for you bottom part / peel free crochet pattern for personal use you may not share translate copy or publish this pattern for private use only no commercial use © barbara strasser 2008 www esbelotta com all rights reserved with yellow in the following 2 rounds you will work the 3 loose parts of the peel please refer to the chart on the right for detailed stitch instructions round 14 in flo * 2 single_crochet slip_stitch in next single_crochet chain 10 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 1 single_crochet in each of the remaining 8 chain slip_stitch in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet  repeat from * 2 times more round 15 * slip_stitch continue in free loops of the chains made in round 14 double_crochet in each of the next 6 chain half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 chain single_crochet in next chain single_crochet pic single_crochet in last chain single_crochet in next single_crochet half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 single_crochet double_crochet in each of the next 6 single_crochet skip slip_stitch and one single_crochet of round 14 sl st in next single_crochet  repeat from * 2 times more round 16 in back loops of round 14
